entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the morning then to rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
